summary: I'm so happy that Caduceus bought the broken sword. Either it's a LotR deal where the repaired version is very powerful, or...
body: I’m so happy that Caduceus bought the broken sword. Either it’s a LotR deal where the repaired version is very powerful, or it’ll provide some cool morsels of Exandrian history if they show it to the right people. Maybe both. Both would be cool.

reblog.comment: I’m so happy that Caduceus bought the broken sword. Either it’s a LotR deal where the repaired version is very powerful, or it’ll provide some cool morsels of Exandrian history if they show it to the right people. Maybe both. Both would be cool.

tags: what is it with barbers and their tendency to cut more than what you ask for?
summary: Critical Role ep 108
body:
Critical Role ep 108

Matt: Hello and welcome to tonight’s episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. My name is Matthew Mercer, the Dungeon Master and the person unable to find a barber who understands “leave it long”.

Everyone around the table: *dies*

While I do think it’s a crime that this barber cut Matt’s hair that short, he still looks handsome <3.

reblog.comment:
Critical Role ep 108

While I do think it’s a crime that this barber cut Matt’s hair that short, he still looks handsome <3.

blog.name: screechthemighty
blog.title: The Chicken of Hope
blog.description: Screech: American, Fanfic Writer, H*cking Nerd. “I know you sound a lot smarter when you’re skeptical and a cynic, but I don’t care.” -Guillermo Del Toro

summary: Continuing the Fanfic Writer Apprecation Day Love Train, here are some random recs for multiple fandoms: My Friend...
body:
Continuing the Fanfic Writer Apprecation Day Love Train, here are some random recs for multiple fandoms:

My Friend Filthy (series) by 99BottlesOfBeerOnTheWall [Critical Role]: This fic has a GREAT Nott voice and really fleshes out her relationship with Caleb in interesting ways. I actually fell behind on reading the third installment because other fandoms have taken over my brain, but the first two are definitely superb and I highly recommend them.

Proper Synchronisation by Thalius [Titanfall] The Titanfall fandom doesn’t have much in the way of fic, but this one is my favorite so far. It’s a good slice-of-life type deal and the BT and Cooper characterizations are both really solid.

The First Moment by ClaroQueQuiza / @claroquequiza​ [Overwatch]: Warnings for suicidal ideation, but I think about this fic all the damn time. For real, this is probably one of my favorite Overwatch fics that I’ve read, even though it’s also heartbreaking as fuck.

you can’t eat the dirt by prufrock [Mad Max]: So I haven’t read this one in a while, but as I was nosing through my bookmarks for fics I knew I really liked, the title of this one jumped out at me. The writing style is honestly so good. It fits Max’s scattered state of mind to a T.

While Shepherds Washed Their Socks by Night by TardisIsTheOnlyWayToTravel [Supernatural/Good Omens]: Okay, I know what you’re thinking: Screech, aren’t you mad at Supernatural? Well, yes, but this fic is a Good Omens crossover with a great dynamic between Gabriel, Aziraphale, and Crowley, and even though I haven’t read it in a while and haven’t watched SPN in years, this is still a fic I remember fondly.

If I by Psilent [Guardians of the Galaxy]: Again, I haven’t read this one in a while, but I want to give it props for one big reason: it’s the only Guardians fic I’ve read in full and it knocked it out of the park. It’s a really good look at OCD and Rocket as a character. Honestly, I need to read it again soon. It’s intense, but worth it.

summary: the last one was fun so let’s do singing voice headcanons for the mighty nein! beau: kinda gruff? definitely in the contralto...
body:
the last one was fun so let’s do singing voice headcanons for the mighty nein!

  • beau: kinda gruff? definitely in the contralto range. iffy about pitch but definitely enthusiastic - but only when she’s singing as a joke/when drunk. very embarrassed about singing sincerely in front of people.
  • caduceus: soooo bassyyy. rumbles like thunder. sings quietly while pruning dead people plants. knows a lot of funeral dirges.
  • caleb: hasn’t sung in, oh, 12 years or so. had a slightly fuzzy but warm baritone, once.
  • fjord: literally a goddamn crooner. scoops like a motherfucker. one big bass drawl. it’s amazing. knows a lot of sea shanties but is a little weird about singing them now.
  • jester: LOVES SINGING!! she’s so enthusiastic!!! a lyric soprano. had some good vocal tutors when she was younger and thus has a solid technique. knows some filthy songs. sings them with relish at inappropriate times.
  • molly: not actually a great singer but so fuckin charming it doesn’t matter. a tenor with a somewhat wavering sense of pitch. can sing in infernal but it sounds like black metal.
  • nott: i believe the word is “screeching”.
  • yasha: a really beautiful mezzo but no projection at all. only sings when she’s alone.

reblog.comment:

  • nott: i believe the word is “screeching”.
  • yasha: a really beautiful mezzo but no projection at all. only sings when she’s alone.

summary: An idea I just had you could enjoy; in Pathfinder bestiary 4, they introduced Kaijus. And because of copyrights they can't use...
question: An idea I just had you could enjoy; in Pathfinder bestiary 4, they introduced Kaijus. And because of copyrights they can't use the real names of the famous Kaijus. Not-Godzilla has the weakness Susceptibility to Song which means that with the power of music someone could convince Not-Godzilla to help them. Now picture this: Scanlan summoning Not-Godzilla with music
answer: SDKJLFHGFS THIS IS Q U A L I T Y

reblog.comment: SDKJLFHGFS THIS IS Q U A L I T Y

trail.content_raw: SDKJLFHGFS THIS IS Q U A L I T Y
trail.content: SDKJLFHGFS THIS IS Q U A L I T Y

blog.title: The Mighty Whatever
blog.description: All things Critical Role. BEWARE OF SPOILERS: Some 18+ content. Basically just my happy place to create and share this beautiful, amazing show.

summary: Caleb Widogast
title: Caleb Widogast
body:
Everyone always makes playlists for this poor, broken-down, self-deprecating, wonderful, kind, gentle, wizard of a man with coffee-house or hozier-type music. 
It’s my personal belief that through his most depression-inducing, inner demon-fighting moments, heavy metal full of burning desire to overcome and conquer plays and pushes him forward.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: sandssavvy
blog.title: Where fandoms collide
blog.description:
I am a giant geek so there will be a lot of fandom posts. However I will also reblog a lot of current events, social justice, etc. I also have some old rp blogs. I am white, dyadic, genderfluid (she or they pronouns), and asexual biromantic. I intend for this blog to be queer positive, trans positive, anti-racism, and intersectionally feminist.

Please let me know if you need any specific trigger warnings if you follow me. I try to trigger warn for any content about rape with "rape culture", "rape", or "tw:rape" also I tag "gifs" or "Gif set" for anyone with epilepsy

My Archive of Our Own fanfic page.

My youtube account

It is mainly full of Critical Role compilation vids and cosplay vids.

and my Ko-fi is here.

In case you would like to support me.

Tumblr posts of my vids are here

tags: who knows what all fjord has seen
summary: Patronage Fjord has seen things both great and terrible during his time at sea.  There are things we see, we should never know...
caption:
Patronage

Fjord has seen things both great and terrible during his time at sea.

There are things we see, we should never know
‘Neath the waters deep and dancing
Strange things flow beyond the lighthouse glow

Slunk low ‘neath the the undertow
There’s creatures lovely and maddening
Strange things flow beyond the lighthouse glow

When the stars hang high and moon’s filled low
They hunt fey, sharp toothed, enchanting
There are things we see, we should never know

Uncanny things lay strong folks low
Turn good ones raving and ranting
Strange things flow beyond the lighthouse glow

My ship and mates lay broken among the sands below
And I encompassed by an eye wa̧tch҉i͡ng all entrancing
There are things we see pot̕e̛͜n͠t̵҉i̵͞al̶̢ we should never know

Though I wander l̢ea̕rn, g͟r̨ow̧ far from that maritime woe
Those haunting…luring words keep advancing
There are things we see p͟r͜ovo̕k҉e̸ we should never know C̨̜̳̭̝͕̪͓O̙̫N̝̭ͅS̵͓̫̝̱͔ͅͅU̡̘͇̰̰͔M̧̘͎̬̰̦͈E̟̯͍̜̮
Strange things flow rew҉a҉r̸d̴ beyond the lighthouse glow
p̸at̢͠ie͘͜ņ͡c҉e͢͡…
